Package tleibert.yahtzee.model.dice

Class DiceBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • tleibert.yahtzee.model.dice.DiceBlock
  • public class DiceBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the 5 dice used in Yahtzee
    Author:
    Trevor Leibert

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int NUM_DICE
      number of dice used in Yahtzee

      • NUM_DICE

        public static final int NUM_DICE
        number of dice used in Yahtzee
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiceBlock

        public DiceBlock()
        Constructor for the DiceBlock class. Each DiceBlock has five dice.

    • Method Detail

      • resetDice

        public void resetDice()
        Sets the value of each Die in this DiceBlock to zero.

      • initialRoll

        public void initialRoll()
        Rolls all of the dice in the block. Intended for use at the start of a player's turn.

      • rollSelected

        public void rollSelected​(boolean[] selected)
        Rolls the selected dice
        Parameters:
        selected - a boolean array representing which dice are selected to be rolled. This is intended for use for a player's second and third rolls.

      • getTally

        public int[] getTally()
        Returns an integer tally of the values of the dice in this DiceBlock
        Returns:
        tally int array of the values of the dice in this DiceBlock

      • getSumOfDice

        public int getSumOfDice()
        Returns the sum of the values of the dice in this DiceBlock
        Returns:
        the sum of the dice values.

      • toIntArray

        public int[] toIntArray()
        Returns an integer array representation of the dice in this DiceBlock
        Returns:
        integer array

      • setDiceValues

        public void setDiceValues​(int[] values)
        Sets the the dice's values in this DiceBlock to be equal to the values in the entered integer array. Intended for testing only.
        Parameters:
        values - values to set the dice to.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the dice in this DiceBlock. Intended primarily for testing.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representing dice
